name: Demon Fumes
description:
Controls:
  • WASD to move and drive
  • E to interact
  • Space bar to shoot
Objective:

You must turn on the generator but to accomplish that, you need to get a key and a battery from the mayors house and powerplant respectively (or to  go faster you can visit the petrol pump which has a car and some explosive barrels)

Notes:
  • Your Oxygen does not run out when sitting inside a car
  • Objects dropped at death glow
